content: materials  fingering/sport yarn in white and 5 more colors colors a b c d e for the rainbow i chose purple blue yellow baby pink and hot pink  2 5 mm hook  yarn needle  some black embroidery floss or yarn abbreviations us terminology st = stitch slip_stitch = slip_stitch chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = treble_crochet increase = increase 2 single_crochet in one st blo = back loops only r = row fo = fasten_off 1 | p age rainbow bookmark pattern © 2017 yum yarn crochet creations all rights reserved instructions rainbow r1 with color a chain 60 this will be the length of your bookmark so feel free to chain as long as you like starting from the 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in each chain 59 fo color a r2 attach color b on the back loop of the 1st half_double_crochet of previous row in blo half_double_crochet in each st 59 fo color b r3 attach color c on the back loop of the 1st half_double_crochet of previous row in blo half_double_crochet in each st 59 fo color c r4 attach color d on the back loop of the 1st half_double_crochet of previous row in blo half_double_crochet in each st 59 fo color d r5 attach color e on the back loop of the 1st half_double_crochet of previous row in blo half_double_crochet in each st 59 fo color e weave in yarn ends 2 | p age rainbow bookmark pattern © 2017 yum yarn crochet creations all rights reserved cloud for the cloud we will make 2 pieces first piece round1 with white yarn chain 4 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next chain single_crochet 4 in last chain turn your work and continue on the other side of the chain single_crochet in next single_crochet 3 in last 10 round2 increase in first st single_crochet in next increase in next 4 st single_crochet in next increase in next 3 st 18 round3 single_crochet in next 4 st increase in next single_crochet in next 3 times single_crochet in next 3 increase in next single_crochet in next 2 times increase in last st and slip_stitch in the first st of the round 24 round4 skip 1 st double_crochet 4 in next skip 1 slip_stitch in next skip 1 double_crochet tr2 double_crochet all in next st skip 1 slip_stitch in next half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet 2 in next double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch skip 2 st double_crochet 5 in next st skip 2 slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet treble_crochet 3 in next st double_crochet sl in next and fo leaving a long tail for sewing second piece repeat rounds 1-3 of first piece and continue with next round round4 skip 1st st double_crochet tr2 double_crochet all in next st skip 1 slip_stitch in next skip 1 double_crochet 4 in next skip 1 slip_stitch in next double_crochet treble_crochet 3 in next st double_crochet slip_stitch in next 2 st skip 2 st double_crochet
